name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Shopify Tracking & Analytics Debugger by Analyzify

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Easily debug and resolve Shopify analytics and tracking issues, supporting Google Analytics 4, Google Ads, and Facebook Pixel.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
We designed this extension to assist Shopify store owners and developers in identifying and resolving data tracking issues on their websites. The Shopify Tracking & Analytics Debugger by Analyzify ensures that all essential ecommerce events, from page views to add-to-cart actions, are accurately captured and sent to Google Analytics 4 (GA4) and Google Ads.

Key use cases include:

- Troubleshooting Shopify and Google Analytics 4 integration.
- Troubleshooting Shopify and Google Ads conversion tracking integration.
- Validating the transfer of all product-level information to third-party tracking scripts, including Facebook Pixel.
- Receiving suggestions on how to fix identified problems.
- Ensuring conversion tracking works as expected.
- Detecting remarketing pixel errors.
